name: Super Idle
description:
A clicker game spinoff on the internet meme "Super Idol".

Click to get more social credits, and spend social credits to get more upgrades for Super Idol!

(best played in fullscreen)

Credits:

MGB - Developer and Publisher

Masapotatus - Help with code
